name: phoenix-epsilon
description: Two-way chat between Discord and Minecraft Bedrock

scripts.copy:root-files: cp package.json LICENSE README.md .build/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp prod.npmrc .build/.npmrc 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.build: npm run install:dev && npm run clean && tsc -p tsconfig.json && npm run prepare:dirs && npm run copy:bin && npm run copy:src-assets && npm run copy:root-files && npm run modify:package
scripts.bundle: npm run build && tsx bundle.ts && npm run clean
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run bundle
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run bundle
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run bundle
scripts.publish: npm run clean:dist && npm run bundle && gh release create v$npm_package_version --title "PhoenixEpsilon v$npm_package_version" --generate-notes ./dist/phoenixepsilon-v$npm_package_version.zip
